did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Archives Information File, Section 1: Boxes 1-22
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English, Albanian, Czechoslovakian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, French, Gaelic, German, Gujarati, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Lithuanian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, Yiddish

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Due to the volume of material in this collection the finding aid has been divided into five sections.
Boxes 44-45 and 102-109 have not been inventoried at this time.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Archives Information File #6047. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p:
Other sections of this collection:
